attributes.action: Save the planet from Overpopulation with a '1 child policy reward system'
attributes.additional_details:
Overpopulation causes a multitude of problems in the UK and globally.

As citizens of a highly developed country we must take responsibility for our disproportionate impact on the worlds resources in relation to climate change. The average UK citizen causes a far greater strain on the world than the global average.
https://populationmatters.org/the-facts/uk

With new laws, we can combat climate change, improve overall quality of life, and make for a brighter future for the next generation.
attributes.background:
A system should be set in place to financially reward those who have 1 or no children.

This money would be diverted from those receiving excessive benefits for having 3+ children.

Measures should be taken to educate why having 3 or more children isn't sustainable or responsible.
